sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCUTE (ſcuturn), a French gold coin of 3s. 4d. in the reign of king Henry V. Catharine queen of England had an aſſurance made her of ſundry caſtles, manors, lands, &c. valued at the ſum of 40,000 ſc utes, every two whereof were worth a noble. Rot. Parl. 1, Hen. VI.
